text: 20 weeks into the year!! We had a packed one! Little trip to the aviary! He loves it so much. Eggplant parm! Rainy field trip for Max! Jordan FELL ASLEEP IN THIS LAUNDRY BASKET!! He was playing and just took a nap… Hockey camp! Planting season. The prettiest. After school snuggles. About to get a haircut. Then we planted some herbs. Obsessed with her. Brunch picnic in the garage. Fishing birthday party which he loved! So super fun. Many house salads this week. First time in hot rollers! I can’t handle it, haha. But the curls fell out immediately! Baby Lucy love! We celebrated my niece’s first communion! But Jordan had tickets to monster jam! Highlight of life. These cutie cousins! Ice cream date. And back on the birthday party circuit. New week loading!
html:
20 weeks into the year!!

We had a packed one!

Little trip to the aviary!

He loves it so much.

Eggplant parm!

Rainy field trip for Max!

Jordan FELL ASLEEP IN THIS LAUNDRY BASKET!! He was playing and just took a nap…

Hockey camp!

Planting season.

The prettiest.

After school snuggles.

About to get a haircut.

Then we planted some herbs.

Obsessed with her.

Brunch picnic in the garage.

Fishing birthday party which he loved!

So super fun.

Many house salads this week.

First time in hot rollers!

I can’t handle it, haha.

But the curls fell out immediately!

Baby Lucy love!

We celebrated my niece’s first communion!

But Jordan had tickets to monster jam!

Highlight of life.

These cutie cousins!

Ice cream date.

And back on the birthday party circuit. New week loading!
